###################################################
# Dockerfile to build scdd 1.0.0 container images #
#             Based on Ubuntu  14.04              #
###################################################

# Set the base image to Ubuntu
FROM ubuntu:14.04

# File Author
MAINTAINER Geoffray Brelurut <brelurut@biologie.ens.fr>

# Install required programs and clean up
RUN echo "deb http://cran.r-project.org/bin/linux/ubuntu trusty/" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/cran.list; \
     apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys E084DAB9; \
     apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends --yes \
     r-base=3.4.1-1trusty0 \
     r-base-core=3.4.1-1trusty0 \
     r-base-dev=3.4.1-1trusty0 \
     r-recommended=3.4.1-1trusty0 \
     r-base-html=3.4.1-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-boot=1.3-17-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-matrix=1.2-10-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-mgcv=1.8-13-1trusty0 \
     r-cran-xml=3.98-1.1-1 \
     r-cran-rcurl=1.95-4.1-1 \
     wget; rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/MASS/MASS_7.3-45.tar.gz \
          https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/Rcpp/Rcpp_0.12.10.tar.gz; \
     R CMD INSTALL Rcpp_0.12.10.tar.gz MASS_7.3-45.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/digest_0.6.12.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f ./digest_0.6.12.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/digest/digest_0.6.12.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/lazyeval_0.2.0.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f ./lazyeval_0.2.0.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/lazyeval/lazyeval_0.2.0.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/rlang_0.1.1.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f ./rlang_0.1.1.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/rlang/rlang_0.1.1.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/gtable_0.2.0.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f ./gtable_0.2.0.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/gtable/gtable_0.2.0.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/stringi_1.1.5.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f ./stringi_1.1.5.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/stringi/stringi_1.1.5.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/stringr_1.2.0.tar.gz \
          https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/magrittr_1.5.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f ./stringr_1.2.0.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/stringr/stringr_1.2.0.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     if [ ! -f magrittr_1.5.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/margittr/magrittr_1.5.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/plyr_1.8.4.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f ./plyr_1.8.4.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/plyr/plyr_1.8.4.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/reshape2_1.4.2.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f ./reshape2_1.4.2.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/reshape2/reshape2_1.4.2.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL digest_0.6.12.tar.gz lazyeval_0.2.0.tar.gz rlang_0.1.1.tar.gz gtable_0.2.0.tar.gz stringi_1.1.5.tar.gz magrittr_1.5.tar.gz stringr_1.2.0.tar.gz plyr_1.8.4.tar.gz reshape2_1.4.2.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/tibble/tibble_1.3.0.tar.gz; \
     R CMD INSTALL tibble_1.3.0.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/RColorBrewer_1.1-2.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f RColorBrewer_1.1-2.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/RColorBrewer/RColorBrewer_1.1-2.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/dichromat_2.0-0.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f dichromat_2.0-0.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/dichromat/dichromat_2.0-0.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/munsell_0.4.3.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f munsell_0.4.3.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/munsell/munsell_0.4.3.tar.gz; \
     fi; \

     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/labeling/labeling_0.3.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/scales_0.4.1.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f scales_0.4.1.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/scales/scales_0.4.1.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL RColorBrewer_1.1-2.tar.gz dichromat_2.0-0.tar.gz colorspace_1.2-6.tar.gz munsell_0.4.3.tar.gz labeling_0.3.tar.gz scales_0.4.1.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/ggplot2_2.2.1.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f ggplot2_2.2.1.tar.gz ]; \

     R CMD INSTALL ggplot2_2.2.1.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/maps/maps_3.1.1.tar.gz \

     R CMD INSTALL dotCall64_0.9-04.tar.gz spam_1.3-0.tar.gz maps_3.1.1.tar.gz fields_8.4-1.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.rstudio.com/src/contrib/Archive/mclust/mclust_5.2.3.tar.gz; \

     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL outliers_0.14.tar.gz; \

     R CMD INSTALL htmltools_0.3.5.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org//src/contrib/bindr_0.1.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f ./bindr_0.1.tar.gz ]; \
     then \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org//src/contrib/bindr/bindr_0.1.tar.gz; \
     fi; \
     R CMD INSTALL bindr_0.1.tar.gz; \
     wget https://cran.r-project.org//src/contrib/plogr_0.1-1.tar.gz; \
     if [ ! -f ./plogr_0.1-1.tar.gz ]; \
